1351040.name: RPG Maker MZ - Character Generator Pack
1351040.description:
Need more original characters for RPG Maker MZ? This character generator pack is compatible for RPG Maker MZ to create more variety from young kids to older characters for your games!

*******************************************
FEATURES: Generator Parts

Accessories 1
Male: 3, Female: 4, Child: 4

Accessories 2
Male: 2, Female: 2, Child: 5 ※ "Helmet" has 2 variants: light ON / OFF

Clothes
Male: 2, Female: 2, Child: 4

Cape
Male: 0, Female: 1, Child: 0

Patterns
Male: 0, Female: 0, Child: 3

Front Hair
Male: 0, Female: 1, Child: 4

Glasses
Male: 3 / Female: 3（same for Male & Female), Child: 0

Eyebrows
Male: 0, Female: 1, Child: 1

Eyes
Male: 0, Female: 2, Child: 1

Facial Hair
Male: 2

Rear Hair
Male: 2, Female: 2, Child: 4

Terms of Use:

* This pack is for use in RPG Maker MZ only
* OK to be used in Commercial projects
* Contents can be edited
* OK for use in games with gore
* OK for use in adult-rated games
